## Collections.CollectorValidator class

A [ConvertingCollector](./ts-utils.collections.convertingcollector.md) wrapper which validates weakly-typed keys and values before calling the wrapped collector.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class CollectorValidator<TKEY extends string = string, TINDEX extends number = number, TITEM extends ICollectible<TKEY, TINDEX> = ICollectible<TKEY, TINDEX>, TSRC = TITEM> implements IReadOnlyResultMapValidator<TKEY, TITEM> 
```
**Implements:** [IReadOnlyResultMapValidator](./ts-utils.collections.ireadonlyresultmapvalidator.md)<!-- -->&lt;TKEY, TITEM&gt;
